item.title: I participated in Kaggle's NFL competition
item.description: ## Competition overview Held from October 10, 2019 to November 27, 2019 (https://www.kaggle.com/c/nfl-big-data-bowl-2020/ ) Predict the number of yards the attacker will advance in an American football run play Available data General information and player-specific information is given for each run play -General information: -Weather, temperature, wind speed, wind direction -Stadium, location, turf condition - Start time -Home/away score -Number of downs (attack ends after 4 times *1) -Number of yards required to continue the attack -Number of yards advanced ‚Üê Predict this -etc… -Information by player *2 -NFL ID -Location information (X, Y) -Movement information (S: speed, A: acceleration) -Orientation (Dir: Body orientation, Orientation: Face orientation) - Birthday - height, weight -Home/away -Jersey number -Position -etc… *1: If you advance 10 yards or more within 4 downs, you will continue to attack.
